Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Evenia Olympic Suites places you in the heart of Lloret de Mar, convenient to Water World and Lloret de Mar Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Can Comadran and Parish Church of Sant Roma.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 162 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers body treatments and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a nightclub, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge) and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Evenia Olympic Suites. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Evenia Olympic Suites. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary breakfast is included.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Evenia Olympic Suites places you in the heart of Lloret de Mar, convenient to Water World and Lloret de Mar Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Can Comadran and Parish Church of Sant Roma.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Water World - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Can Comadran - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Parish Church of Sant Roma - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Lloret de Mar Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Maritime Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Sant Joan’s Castle - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Puig de Castellet - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Sa Caleta Beach - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Santa Clotilde Gardens - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Pitch and Putt Papalus Golf Club - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Sant Joan Castle - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Cala Boadella Beach - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Gnomo Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Santa Cristina Beach - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Santa Cristina's Shrine - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi

The preferred airport for Evenia Olympic Suites is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 77.6 km / 48.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
